citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 09:30 on
11-Sep-19.
Arrived at facility, knocked on door, honked horn, called provided number and received no response. Left and
returned later at 11:00 to still find no responsible adult available.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 09:30 on
11-Sep-19.
Arrived at facility, knocked on door, honked horn, called provided number and received no response.  Left and
returned later at 11:00 to still find no responsible adult available.
